analysis.description:
VIVACHAIN.z_admin_withdraw_ether (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#870-878) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.send(_withdraw_wei_value) == false (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#875-876)

VIVACHAIN.list_frozen_accounts (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#988-1007) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- when == 0x0

VIVACHAIN.start_Stage0_Trade (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#553-582) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- is_debug == true && block.timestamp < stage0_locked_year * 10 * 60 + when_public_allowed_to_trade_started (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#569-576)
	- is_debug == false && block.timestamp < stage0_locked_year * 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 + when_public_allowed_to_trade_started (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#565-569)

VIVACHAIN.list_frozen_accounts (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#988-1007) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- account_frozen_time[holders_frozen[i]] > 0x0 (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#1000-1001)
	- when == 0x0 (/unique_chucks/7/0x8eeb9e0df7092ebe81b02447af77914482b546c5.sol#1005)
